page.title: 04Forty Foot Picnic Site
page.content: Situated on the boundary between Bedfordshire and Northamptonshire at Dungee Corner is Forty Foot Lane Picnic site. This 4 acre site was opened by Bedfordshire County Council in 1976. There are several parking spaces and four sets of picnic tables and chairs and litter bins. This is a very attractive and popular picnic site,that has been visited by many people from both sides of the county boundary. Some people go to the picnic site, just to use the 'on-site' facilities and others use it as a base for walking on the extensive public right of way network in the area. The site has attracted over 2,000 visitors during the last year- 1984/85.
